boardgame.name: Dogs of War
boardgame.description: Dogs of War is an elegant game set in a steampunk-influenced renaissance universe. Noble houses engage each other in a series of fierce battles, and it's up to the players and the Dogs of War they control to deploy their private armies in support of whatever house they wish to favor. Clockwork knights and imposing war machines shift the tides of war as they enter the battlefields, but the interest of their Dog of War captains actually lie in the rewards offered by each noble house to its supporters. Each Dog of War has a special ability that helps them claim influence, win battles, or betray the house to which they've sworn allegiance!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Dogs of War is not a game of pure military power, but rather a game in which deception and betrayal often lead the way to a decisive victory. The goal for the Dogs of War is to earn the most power by the end of the game. Thanks to thoughtful game design and development, there are many ways to achieve this, like defeating other captains in battle, getting rewards from the Houses you help, amassing gold and troops, and most importantly, gaining influence with the most successful Houses._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: New-in-shrink, fresh from Kickstarter distribution. Includes: 1 Dogs Of War Core Box 1 Count Iago 1 Captain Viscount Perceval D’hiver 1 Captain Alhazred 1 Plastic Coin Pack 1 Gold Foil Solder Deck 1 Tactic Cards Pack 1 Order Of Battle Tiles

Dogs of War by Paolo Mori (Libertalia, Augustus). Published by Spaghetti Western Games and CoolMiniorNot! Brand New Kickstarter Edition. Comes with all the Kickstarter Exclusive Figures and all stretch goals. This includes: Captain Count Iago (Kickstarter Exclusive) Captain Viscount Perceval d’Hiver (Kickstarter Exclusive) Captain Alhazred (Kickstarter Exclusive) Mother Apollonia (Kickstarter Exclusive) Gold Foil Soldier Deck (Kickstarter Exclusive) Sculpted Plastic Coins (20 Silver _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; 16 Gold) (Kickstarter Exclusive) Buyer responsible for all shipping charges. I will typically go with USPS Parcel Select for domestic shipping, unless you specify a different method. I will use USPS Priority International for everyone outside the US. This one weighs about 6 pounds altogether.
